title: A Separation - Jodaeiye Nader az Simin (2011)
description:
Jodaeiye Nader az Simin ( A Separation ) (2011)

PG-13  123 min  -  Drama

Rating 8.5/10 [ imdb.com ]

A couple has to make a decision to leave Iran to better the life of their child or to stay and take care of a parent suffering from Alzheimers; however, the couple\\\'s marriage may end in divorce.

Director: Asghar Farhadi
Writer: Asghar Farhadi
Stars: Peyman Moaadi, Leila Hatami and Sareh Bayat

Country: Iran
Language: Persian
Release Date: 16 March 2011 (Iran)
Filming Locations: Tehran, Iran
